content: the sleeves please see the photo tutorial below to make sure the numbers are right row 11 ws knit 5 purl 2 knit 9 11 13 14 16 17 19 rm bind off the next 22 24 27 29 32 34 36 sleeve stitches knitwise rm knit 28 33 36 39 42 45 48 rm bind off the next 22 24 27 29 32 34 36 sleeves stitches knitwise rm knit 9 11 13 14 16 17 19 purl 2 knit 5 60 69 76 81 88 93 100 stitches row 12 rs knit to the side cast on 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 stitches knit to the side cast on 2 2 2 2 2 2 2 stitches knit to the end 64 73 80 85 92 97 104 stitches backwards loop cast on row 13 ws knit 5 purl 2 knit to the last 7 stitches purl 2 knit 5 taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2022 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 2 row 14 rs knit to the end row 15 ws knit 5 purl 2 knit to the last 7 stitches purl 2 knit 5 repeat row 14 and 15 until the body of the sweater measures 4 ½ 5 5 ½ 6 ½ 7 9 11 inches from the underarm row 16 rs knit to the end row 17 ws knit to the end row 18 rs knit to the end row 19 ws bind off knit wise finishing weave in your end sew the buttons on block and enjoy ws - wrong side yo - yarn over sm- slip marker pm - place marker ssk slip slip knit together kfb - knit into the front and back of the stitch rs - right side k2tog- knit two stitches together rm remove marker this is how i counted the stitches as i bound them off taiga hilliard designs ©taiga hilliard all rights reserved 2022 this pattern is for personal use only you can print this pattern but cannot distribute by hardcopy or electronically for free or for sale page 3
